price: Mümin olarak salih amel işleyen kimse, zulme uğratılmaktan da korkmaz, (hakkının) eksiltilmesinden de.
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَلَا يَخَافُ ظُلۡمٗا وَلَا هَضۡمٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿmal mina al-ṣāliḥāti wahuwa mu'minun falā yakhāfu ẓul'man walā haḍman
